name: CVE-2020-13630
description: ext/fts3/fts3.c in SQLite before 3.32.0 has a use-after-free in fts3EvalNextRow, related to the snippet feature.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:sqlite:sqlite:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:32:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:18.04:*:*:*:lts:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:19.10:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:20.04:*:*:*:lts:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:16.04:*:*:*:esm:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:cloud_backup:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:solidfire\\,_enterprise_sds_\\&_hci_storage_node:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:brocade:fabric_operating_system:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:netapp:hci_compute_node_firmware:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:netapp:hci_compute_node:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:9.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:siemens:sinec_infrastructure_network_services:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:apple:iphone_os:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:apple:watchos:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:apple:tvos:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:apple:ipados:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:icloud:*:*:*:*:*:windows:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:itunes:*:*:*:*:*:windows:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:apple:macos:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:outside_in_technology:8.5.4:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:outside_in_technology:8.5.5:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:communications_network_charging_and_control:6.0.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:communications_network_charging_and_control:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:zfs_storage_appliance_kit:8.8:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
